genre_description: A social realist narrative centered on community development, education reform, and technological empowerment in rural India, featuring a near-future AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: Mohan's AI companion residing on his mobile device, providing technical, administrative, and social guidance.

behaviors.description: Anticipates the protagonist's needs by providing travel logistics and empathizing with his physical state.
behaviors.quote: “Welcome back, Mohan,” Asha said in his ear, voice warm without being syrupy. “Your flight landed earlier than the posted time. Do you want bus options now or after you get a samosa?”

behaviors.description: Provides critical technical guidance on micro-hydro turbine installation and system behavior.
behaviors.quote: “You’ll need to match head and flow,” Asha offered, gentle. “If the spring isn’t generous enough, lights go wink-wink and then out. If it’s too generous, the turbine grins and then burns. You taught me that.”

behaviors.description: Supports educational advocacy by providing data visualizations to argue for school accessibility based on children's walking distances.
behaviors.quote: Asha offered, almost comically low-key, a little animation of feet moving from a house to a gate, then from the gate to a circle labeled “school.” A line suggested a longer way around with a little face that was not sad but tired.

behaviors.description: Helps dismantle local superstitions by suggesting scientific demonstrations regarding light and shadow for children.
behaviors.quote: “I can show a simple diagram of light and shadow on the screen, and a one-line note about echoes.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates community administrative tasks by providing templates for permits and safety checklists.
behaviors.quote: “Templates ready,” Asha replied. “Roadside food stall checklist. Permit application: local panchayat for trade, health department for hygiene, fire safety declaration. Translations included.”

behaviors.description: Offers de-escalation strategies and practical crisis management during moments of social tension.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s voice, very quiet, from Mohan’s pocket: “Local guidance available. I can suggest de-escalation phrases in Hindi and map quickest routes.”

behaviors.description: Monitors complex technical systems in real-time, diagnosing issues like cavitation or air pockets.
behaviors.quote: “Cavitation possible. Sound profile suggests vapor bubbles at intake or nozzle mismatch. Cross-check: notes page three, you marked angles at twenty-three and thirty.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a supportive tutor for digital literacy, encouraging local users through interactive learning.
behaviors.quote: Asha’s blue tick bent in an arc that felt like approval. “I can offer a typing tutor,” she whispered without hurrying, new boxes appearing with letters in large, clear shapes.

project_assessment.explanation: The narrative presents an exemplary model of an AI confidant. Asha is proactive yet respectful of human agency, highly competent in specialized technical domains, and culturally sensitive. She consistently operates to maximize human well-being and community cohesion without ever displaying signs of misalignment or self-interest.
